behaviorPolicy.notEnabled: Note that the display and editing of Behavior Policies are not yet supported

page.title: Data Hub on Edge
page.description: The Data Hub on Edge provides mechanisms to define how MQTT data and MQTT client behavior are handled from the adaptors to the HiveMQ broker

policy.title: Policies
policy.description: This is where all your policies will be listed.

schema.title: Schemas
schema.description: All your schemas used for validation or transformation will be listed there.

script.title: Scripts
script.description: Your transformation code will be listed there.

delete.message: Are you sure? You can't undo this action afterward.

clipboard.content_zero: No items copied in the clipboard

clear.header: Do you want to clear the Designer?
clear.confirmation: It will clean the content of the canvas, leaving the Designer empty and ready to create a new draft. The action cannot be reversed

modify.header: Do you want to modify the policy?
modify.confirmation: The current version of your policy will be open for changes. However some elements will not be modifiable.

panel.helper: Drag elements on the canvas then connect them

build.title: Build
build.description: Build your policy on the canvas

check.title: Check
check.description: Check the validity of your policy

publish.title: Publish
publish.description: Publish your policy on your topology

codeEditor.loadingError: The advanced editor cannot be loaded. Syntax highlighting is not supported

version.create: Create a new version '{{ newVersion }}' from '{{ oldVersion }}'
version.status_MODIFIED: MODIFIED - a new version will be created

success.description_error: Run a check before trying to publish
success.title_warning: The policy is not completely valid and will not successfully run on your topology.
success.description_warning: The following parts of the policy needs correction:
success.title_success: The policy is fully valid to run on your topology.

modal.message_EDGE_ONLY_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{ count }} connection? The operation cannot be reversed.
modal.message_EDGE_ONLY_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{ count }} connections? The operation cannot be reversed.
modal.message_MODE_ONLY_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{ count }} node? The operation cannot be reversed.
modal.message_MODE_ONLY_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{ count }} nodes? The operation cannot be reversed.
modal.message_BOTH: Are you sure you want to delete {{ count }} nodes and connections? The operation cannot be reversed.

delete.message_one: The selected element cannot be deleted because of some constraints
delete.message_other: The selected elements cannot be deleted because of some constraints
delete.topicFilter: Topic filter cannot be modified once published
delete.policyNode: Policy node cannot be deleted once published

readonly.title: The policy is in read-only mode

protobuf.template: // CANNOT DECODE THE PROTOBUF SOURCE - {{ source }}
protobuf.encoding: The encoding of the PROTOBUF code into a Base64 descriptor cannot be validated.

topicFilter.duplicate: The topic filter {{ filter }} is already defined
topicFilter.alreadyMatching: A policy is already matching the topic filter {{ filter }}

dataPolicy.notLoading: Cannot load the existing policies for checking ids
dataPolicy.notUnique: The id is already in use by another data policy

behaviourPolicy.notLoading: Cannot load the existing policies for checking ids
behaviourPolicy.notUnique: The id is already in use by another behavior policy

operation.notLoading: Cannot load the existing operations for checking ids
operation.notUnique: The id is already in use by a prior operation in the pipeline

schema.unknown: Cannot identify the type of the SCHEMA - {{ type }}

behavior.noModel: Something is wrong with the transition model

operation.unknown: Something is wrong with the operation
operation.noTransition: cannot create the node for the transition pipeline - {{ source }}

dryRun.noHandleConnected: No $t(datahub:workspace.nodes.type, { 'context': '{{source}}' }) connected to the "{{ handle }}" handle of $t(datahub:workspace.nodes.type, { 'context': '{{target}}' })
dryRun.notConfigured: The $t(datahub:workspace.nodes.type, { 'context': '{{source}}' }) is not properly defined. The following properties are missing: {{ properties }}
dryRun.notValidated: The $t(datahub:workspace.nodes.type, { 'context': '{{source}}' }) is not properly configured: {{ error }}
dryRun.internal: Encountered an error while processing $t(datahub:workspace.nodes.type, { 'context': '{{source}}' }): {{ error }}

publish.title: $t(datahub:workspace.nodes.type, { 'context': '{{source}}' }) published
publish.description: We've created a new $t(datahub:workspace.nodes.type, { 'context': '{{source}}' }) for you.

load.title: $t(datahub:workspace.nodes.type, { 'context': '{{source}}' }) published
load.description: We've created a new $t(datahub:workspace.nodes.type, { 'context': '{{source}}' }) for you.

notActivated.title: Data Hub on Edge is available under a commercial license, <1>please contact us</1>.

notDefined.title: Not identified
notDefined.description: The policy is not a valid document

elementNotDefined.title: Error loading the node
elementNotDefined.description: The $t(datahub:workspace.nodes.type, { 'context': '{{nodeType}}' }) is not a valid element

keys.ESC: Cancel the node selection and clear the content of the clipboard
keys.TAB: Nodes, connections and toolbars are all focusable by using the TAB key
keys.Meta+ENTER: Add the focused node to the selection (or remove it if selected)
keys.Meta+C_Selected: Copy the selected nodes (and their connections)
keys.Meta+V_Designer: Create new nodes from the previous copy
keys.ArrowLeft_Selected: Move the nodes one grid space to the left
keys.ArrowRight_Selected: Move the nodes one grid space to the right
keys.ArrowUp_Selected: Move the nodes one grid space up
keys.ArrowDown_Selected: Move the nodes one grid space down
keys.Shift+drag_Designer: Select all the nodes in the area
keys.Meta+click_Designer: Add the clicked node to the selection (or remove if selected)
